title: Evelyn's Book
description: In 600 AD, Evelyn has an okay life as a farmer. She has a family and a boyfriend.The universe is against her. People find out she is a witch, and witches burn at the stake. Her biggest fear in life was dying of starvation, but it became her second after being burned alive.If only she could learn to shape the power in her veins. Instead, she escapes and travels far. A mythical guide finds her and steers her towards an old witch.A comedy set in the dark ages with fun characters and a quick pace.
author: Geoffrey C. Porter
